Desc.entry: A registered national charity which helps elderly and/or terminally ill people look after their pets. Has a network of 12,000 volunteers for dog walking for housebound people, fostering pets when their owners are in hospital, fetching cat and dog food and cleaning out a bird cage etc. Keeps a list of pet friendly care homes and takes on the care of pets whose owner has passed away. Provides help with any pets. Also provides vet transport . Application forms can be downloaded from the website. Volunteers from the Sheffield area are welcome.
